nameserverB.description:
If the IP given does not act as a DNS server and answer DNS requests there may be delays at login time post installation.
The DB cluster doesn't require DNS name solution so DNS servers can be unreachable from DB cluster.
However, in case if any DNS server is reachable from DB cluster, ensure its IP is the first entry of the server list (DNS Server A) to prevent a failed installation caused by resolver timeout.

enclosure1_uplink_B_port2.description: Only applicable for use with hardware commissioning script.

nameserverA.description:
If the IP given does not act as a DNS server and answer DNS requests there may be delays at login time post installation.
The DB cluster doesn't require DNS name solution so DNS servers can be unreachable from DB cluster.
However, in case if any DNS server is reachable from DB cluster, ensure its IP is the first entry of the server list (DNS Server A) to prevent a failed installation caused by resolver timeout.

smrs_sftp_securePort.htmlDescription:
Note:

1) smrs_sftp_securePort and smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable are not accessible at run time so any change will require ENM installation or upgrade.
2) The above SED parameters are meant for Network having only Radio and RadioTNodes.

smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable.description: This flag, when set to true, enables hardening of ENM for use cases like SW upgrade, licence installation, Backup and Restore, netlog, Auto integration against RadioNode and RadioTNode. It breaks these use cases on all other nodes type (e.g. SIU/TCU, Minilink, EnodeB , BSC, Router6K etc).
smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable.htmlDescription:
Note:

1) smrs_sftp_securePort and smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable are not accessible at run time so any change will require ENM installation or upgrade.
2) The above SED parameters are meant for Network having only Radio and RadioTNodes.
3) Based upon the above SED parameter values, the operations like Node Software Upgrade, License installation, Backup and Restore, Netlog, AMOS, Element Manager, General Scripting, Release Independence Manager will be impacted in the Network .

The SED parameter(smrs_sftp_port_partition_enable) value can be assigned true or false based on the Network Topology.

longDescription: The multicast_snooping property is used to enable or disable multicast snooping (br0). By default this should be set to 1.
If the property is set to 0 (disabled), then set multicast_querier=0, multicast_router=1 and hash_max=512 (recommended value).
If the property is set to 1 (enabled), then set multicast_querier=1, multicast router=2 and hash_max=4096 (recommended value).
